meetings.buildingName: Grad Sch of Lib & Info Science

sectionNotes: Not intended for students with Freshman class standing.
sectionText: Sophomores, juniors and seniors.  Explores cultural ideas about computers, including hopes and fears about the effects of computers on our lives. Will analyze images of computers in fiction and movies. The course will also examine hackers, online subcultures, and other computer-related subcultures, and the integration of computers into various cultural practices.  Meets with LIS 390CC.  3 UG hours.
